It is not driver's mistake  but it is also your due diligence to read the description before accepting the job. If you know the order is already late  you still pick up the order then you should prepare for unnecessary explanation. Best is to avoid the job liao.
Best is don't pick up this urgent late order  stress up yourself and see the recipient unhappy face for waiting so long. Not worth it.

No need stress up. Just rem u have 30mins to pickup  and 1 hr to deliver from pickup. But of cos best u do ASAP lahüòÇ anyway for such orders better call the resto b4 gg to pickup to check if the order has already been pickup as sometimes have double order. Or if has been cancelled by resto but they nvr update oddle or oddle nvr update.

Also check if the resto got inform the recipient that they couldn't get driver n will be late. Some restos don't inform one expect us to inform or wait for customer call to kpkb. If not informed call the recipient let them know resto couldn't get driver and that u just got the job n just pickup the food so that u wouldn't kena scold or blackface or complain
